item.title: Statistical Machine Translation on Azure VM using Moses
item.description: Lately I’ve been working on a side project - a statistical machine translation model (from German to English) using the Moses SMT toolkit. I’ve been using laptop to perform even the heavier computations, some of which even took from 6 to 8 hours. It was all manageable until the last stage, where on a reasonable machine with 4 CPU cores it was going to take more than a week to complete.
